name: Hera Hotel
description: The Hera Hotel offers a luxurious waterfront experience in the heart of Miami. Boasting modern amenities, spacious rooms with ocean views, and a rooftop infinity pool, it is the perfect destination for both relaxation and entertainment. The hotel's prime location provides easy access to South Beach, downtown Miami, and various cultural attractions.

name: Alessandra Hotel
description: Perched high above the Mediterranean Sea, the Belmond Hotel Caruso in Ravello offers breathtaking views of the Amalfi Coast. This former 11th-century palace is surrounded by terraced gardens and features an infinity pool that appears to blend seamlessly with the sea below. Guests can explore the historic town of Ravello, relax in the luxurious spa, and dine on authentic Italian cuisine while soaking up the sun and panoramic views.

name: Bayou Hotel
description: A luxurious beachfront resort with an urban vibe. The area provides access to a wide variety of restaurants and clubs, as well as museums and cultural sites. The Bayou Hotel is the perfect home away from home for those who enjoy water sports and city life. The resort is only a short commute away from the French Quarter.

name: Cassandra Hotel
description: A luxurious beachfront resort with an urban vibe. The resort boasts spacious suites and villas with private terraces, direct beach access, and stunning ocean views. Guests can enjoy the resort's championship golf course, world-class spa, and gourmet dining options, as well as participate in various water activities such as snorkeling, scuba diving, and deep-sea fishing.
